summary: Developed multiple classifiers for hand, upper-body, scene and activity detection in Big Bang Theory Video dataset
title: Activity Recognition In Big Bang Theory Scenes

summary: Designed a model to predict the current popularity of popular songs over time i.e. how popular or not-so-popular songs when originally released are doing today?
title: Do popular songs endure?

summary: A mini-gcc compiler which can handle simple sorting programs.
title: Mini GCC Compiler

summary: Developed a popular web tool for SPOJ (Sphere Online Judge) users to get correct output for a set of input, decided upon by the user, on a SPOJ Problem. 100 unique page views every day.
title: SPOJ Toolkit

title: I will be spending my summer at Facebook, Menlo Park. Looking forward to an amazing summer!
